title: The "Tale of Genji" Album (Genji monogatari gaj√¥), Part 1
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Bequest of the Hofer Collection of the Arts of Asia
dated: Muromachi period, remounted in 17th c. and again in 1998-99
